column4: hi all, ubuntu oneiric up to date. alsa installed, audio working (realtek alc262) but I neither can control it with the volume widget nor see it listed in sound (system settings) hardware
any idea? already did the "trick" to add options snd-hda-intel model=ALC262 to /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf
open a terminal and type alsamixer
then what? I want to use the volume in the bar.
